title: Momentum - Using impulse to find friction

content.description: A box of mass <math alttext="m" overflow="scroll"><mi>m</mi></math> is pulled in a straight line by a constant force <math alttext="F" overflow="scroll"><mi>F</mi></math> across a horizontal surface. There is friction between the box and the surface. The box initially moves with a velocity <math alttext="v sub 0" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mstyle></math>, and slows to a velocity <math alttext="v" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mi>v</mi></mstyle></math> after a time <math alttext="t" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi></math>.
content.question: Which of the following expressions correctly describes the frictional force exerted by the rough surface on the box?

choices.label: <math alttext="F t, minus m v, plus m times v sub 0" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mi>F</mi><mi>t</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>m</mi><mi>v</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>m</mi><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="F minus open parenthesis, the fraction with numerator m v minus m times v sub 0, and denominator t, close parenthesis" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mi>F</mi><mo>−</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>m</mi><mi>v</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>m</mi><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mrow><mi>t</mi></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator m v minus m times v sub 0, and denominator t" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mrow><mi>m</mi><mi>v</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>m</mi><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mrow><mi>t</mi></mfrac></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="F minus m v, plus m times v sub 0" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mi>F</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>m</mi><mi>v</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>m</mi><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="F minus open parenthesis, the fraction with numerator m v minus m times v sub 0, and denominator t, close parenthesis" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mi>F</mi><mo>−</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>m</mi><mi>v</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>m</mi><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mrow><mi>t</mi></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
